booksSciFi.title: The Hunger Games

booksSciFi.title: The Da Vinci Code
booksSciFi.author: Dan Brown
booksSciFi.description: A mystery thriller novel that follows symbologist Robert Langdon and cryptologist Sophie Neveu as they investigate a murder in the Louvre Museum in Paris.
